meanings.definition: A person who wanders from place to place.
meanings.sent1: The wanderers traveled far and wide to explore new lands.
meanings.sent2: The group of wanderers set out on a journey across the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The wanderers got lost in the forest but found their way back with a map.
meanings.sent4: The wanderers of the desert were like nomads under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent5: The image of the wanderers walking into the sunset stayed in my mind.

meanings.definition: A group of people or animals that wander.
meanings.sent1: We saw a herd of wanderers moving gracefully through the meadow.
meanings.sent2: The wanderers, consisting of travelers and their pets, roamed freely in the park.
meanings.sent3: The wanderers, a mix of tourists and stray cats, explored the city streets together.
meanings.sent4: The wanderers, like a flock of birds, changed direction swiftly as if guided by an unseen force.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the wanderers meandering along the riverbank was peaceful and serene.
